summary: Documentation for bundleWorkflowCode is insufficient, lacking guidance on passing interceptors through the function to prevent non-determinism errors when replaying workflows. Users are unclear how to pass the bundled code to Worker.create.
userImpact: Developers cannot correctly implement workflow code bundling and interceptors, leading to non-determinism errors during workflow replay.
proposedFix: Add documentation to bundleWorkflowCode API reference explaining that interceptors must be passed through this function and is necessary for replay to work correctly.
resolutionDetails: Documentation was improved to clarify bundleWorkflowCode usage and interceptor handling.
keyQuote: Better documentation around bundleWorkflowCode to indicate that interceptors should be passed in through bundleWorkflowCode and is necessary if used with replaying
